SELECT v.aid Aid, v.title Title, v.pub_time PubTime, v.copyright Copyright, v.uid Uid, v.play Play, u.id Id, u.face Face, v.cover Cover FROM mug_video v LEFT JOIN mug_game_content c ON v.aid = c.aid LEFT JOIN mug_uploader u ON v.uid = u.uid WHERE c.game_id = #{gameId}
AND date(v.pub_time) >= str_to_date(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d' )
AND str_to_date(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d' ) >= date(v.pub_time)
ORDER BY play DESC LIMIT 20

select aid Aid, bid Bid, title Title, pub_time PubTime, copyright Copyright, uid Uid, play Play, cover Cover, tag, id Id, type, content_id from v_video v where v.type = 'S' and v.content_id = #{songId}

SELECT r.* FROM ( SELECT z.uid, u.id, round( sum( z.play * z.proportion ), 1 ) play, count( 1 ) count FROM ( SELECT v.uid, v.pub_time, v.play,
ifnull( f.proportion, 1 ) proportion
1 proportion
FROM mug_video v
LEFT JOIN mug_play_config f ON datediff( str_to_date(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d'), date( v.pub_time ) ) = f.date_diff
WHERE date( v.pub_time ) >= str_to_date(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d') AND str_to_date(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') >= date( v.pub_time ) and v.aid not in (select d.aid from mug_dssq d) ) z LEFT JOIN mug_uploader u ON z.uid = u.uid GROUP BY z.uid ) r ORDER BY r.play DESC LIMIT 30

SELECT z.*, g.common_name game FROM ( SELECT c.game_id, sum(v.play) play FROM mug_video v LEFT JOIN mug_game_content c ON v.aid = c.aid WHERE date(v.pub_time) >= str_to_date(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND str_to_date(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d') >= date(v.pub_time) and v.aid not in (select d.aid from mug_dssq d) GROUP BY c.game_id ) z JOIN mug_game g ON z.game_id = g.game_id ORDER BY play DESC LIMIT 30

select u.uid, u.id, z.play_avg , z.count from ( select v.uid, avg( v.play ) play_avg, sum( 1 ) count from mug_video v where v.dssq is null and v.copyright = '1' and v.pub_time < #{date} group by v.uid having sum( 1 ) >= 15 ) z left join mug_uploader u on z.uid = u.uid order by z.play_avg desc limit 30

SELECT * FROM mug_video v WHERE v.aid NOT IN ( SELECT c.aid FROM mug_game_content c ) and v.play >= #{minPlay} AND date( v.pub_time ) >= str_to_date(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and str_to_date(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') >= date( v.pub_time )
order by v.play desc

SELECT v.*, c.game_id FROM mug_video v left join mug_game_content c on v.aid = c.aid WHERE v.aid NOT IN ( SELECT d.aid FROM mug_dssq d ) AND date( v.pub_time ) >= str_to_date(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and str_to_date(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') >= date( v.pub_time )
and date( v.update_time ) >= str_to_date(#{updateDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND v.play >= #{minPlay} order by v.play desc
